name: Indie Graphics Builder #2 (Create Sprites for Your Game)
blurb: Royalty Free assets to create your own graphics. For RPG characters, spaceships, platforms, maps, logo's, adventures, and more.

rewards.reward: HEY, THE IGB IS A GOOD IDEA!\r\n==============================\r\nFor any support, we'll feature your indie games on our community site roencia.com supported by YouTube, Facebook, & Twitter channels. Your games will get noticed.

SPACESHIP ENTHUSIAST - Shmups\r\n==============================\r\nMaking a Shoot m' Up and need some space assets?  We have around 45 styles to choose from.  Support our project at this tier and receive 5 of those graphic pack styles to build your own fleet.

I WANT TO BE IN A VIDEO GAME
==============================
We all do man, believe me.  Send me a picture of yourself, a friend, or a character you've drawn and I'll make an animated pixel character of them.  I'll send you the character when finished.

The clothes and assets will be separate and compatible with other assets in the full RPG Character pack.

*Note - Character style is subject to change and may not fully represent sample shown.

* Requirement & Copyright  - By accepting this pledge, you fully agree that others may use your character as a royalty free asset in their game.

THIS PLEDGE HAS CHARACTER (Animated Character Pack) ==============================\r\nIf customizable animated pixel RPG characters is all that you care about, this is for you.  Will include character pack updates as they come.

THE ORIGINAL IGB #1 PACKAGE
==============================
If you missed the original 9,000 graphics as part of IGB, you can get that here if that's all you want.  Will be available as a downloadable package.  Will not receive updates like IGB Phase 2, but is still an extensive library of over 9,000 assets.

* May Upgrade Later for Full Package

EARLY BACKER SURPRISE\r\n==============================\r\nAwesome special deal made especially because of our IGB #1 supporters.  Includes unlimited access to the Indie Graphics Builder webpage & Steam, so you may download IGB Phase 1 & 2 graphic packs as they arrive.  *New content duration depends on kickstarter funding.

GRAPHICS BUILDER COMPLETE (Team License) ==============================\r\nThis includes unlimited access to the Indie Graphics Builder webpage, so you may download IGB #1 and IGB #2 packs as they arrive.  Team license allows for 1 user access to website or Steam, but only your team may use the assets for the game you are developing assuming you are an indie game developer and not an established business. *New content duration depends on kickstarter funding.

GRAPHICS FOR EDUCATION (Class License) ==============================\r\nAs the instructor you get access to Steam and the IGB resources to be used in class.  The students may use the resources provided for learning and game creating, but for personal use and not to sell commercially.

GRAPHICS BUILDER COMPLETE (Business License) \r\n==============================\r\nThis includes unlimited access to the Indie Graphics Builder webpage & Steam, so you may download IGB #2 and IGB #1 graphic packs and updates. Business license allows for 1 user access to website, but your business may use the assets for game development no matter the team size or number of projects. *New content duration depends on kickstarter funding.
